about.title: 关于本站
about.description: 一个极简双语的静态个人主页，用于展示我的学术旅程与金融科技探索。

welcome.title: 欢迎语
welcome.description: 欢迎访问我的网站。你可以随意了解更多关于我，也可以查看我的简历、项目、经历，或者联系我。

intro.en: I am an undergraduate student in SWUFE, enrolled in Finance major in RIEM (minor in Business Administration and the Honors Program in Mathematics). I have a solid background in quantitative strategies and blockchain technologies. I specialize in developing machine learning–based, high-frequency, and market-making strategies and have achieved over 300% returns through discretionary trading in cryptocurrency markets. I am interested in exploring emerging research directions at the intersection of finance, mathematics and computer science.
intro.zh: 我是西南财经大学经管国际实验班（辅修工商管理以及数学荣誉课程）的一名金融专业本科在读生，拥有扎实的量化策略和区块链技术背景。我擅长开发机器学习和高频交易策略以及做市策略，曾通过自主交易实现超过 300% 的收益。我热衷于探索金融、数学、计算机科学交叉融合下的新兴方向。
